summary.intent: Replace placeholder/simplified inline SVG logos in ContextTab and RemediateTab with official agent logos (Claude, GitHub Copilot, Cursor) via a shared AgentLogos component.
summary.outcome: Created AgentLogos.tsx with three logo components and an agentLogoMap, updated ContextTab.tsx to use shared components, and updated RemediateTab.tsx to show logos alongside labels in agent/provider buttons. All TypeScript, tests, and lint checks passed, and changes were committed.

repo: frontend/assets/agents/ contains SVG logo files — cursor-logo.svg was invalid (14 bytes, 404 content); claude-logo.svg and githubcopilot-logo.svg were valid
The project uses Biome for linting (bun run lint) and has auto-fix support via --write flag
Shared UI components live in frontend/src/components/; no dedicated icons or assets directory is imported from SVG files — logos are inlined in JSX
The agentLogoMap keys used: 'claude', 'claude-code', 'github-copilot', 'cursor'; agents without logos: 'agents-md', 'codex', 'opencode'

code.finding: Previously contained inline CopilotLogo and CursorLogo components; now removed and replaced with imports from AgentLogos.tsx
Previously contained an inline 16x16 simplified Claude SVG; replaced with <ClaudeLogo className='w-4 h-4' />
Target agent buttons and provider selector buttons updated from text-only to flex logo+text layout using agentLogoMap lookups
New shared file: exports ClaudeLogo (fill #D97757 brand color), GitHubCopilotLogo (currentColor), CursorLogo (inline fallback), and agentLogoMap Record<string, ReactNode>

workflow: When Edit tool fails due to tab/space indentation mismatches, Python subprocess (sed-like) replacement via Bash is a reliable fallback
Biome lint errors from JSX formatting can be auto-fixed with 'bun run lint --write' rather than manual edits
Another agent may have modified files mid-session; always re-read files after an interruption before continuing edits
Linters may auto-remove unused imports — if an import is added before its usages are in place, it can get stripped

friction: Edit tool failed repeatedly on ContextTab.tsx due to tab vs space indentation mismatches in old_string matching — required Python-based Bash replacements
Session was interrupted mid-implementation by another agent modifying the files; required re-reading all files and reconciling state before continuing
The AgentLogos import was stripped by the linter after being added, before its usages were in place — caused a confusing intermediate broken state
cursor-logo.svg was invalid (14 bytes, '404: Not Found' content) requiring a fallback to the existing inline SVG
open_items: cursor-logo.svg in frontend/assets/agents/ is still invalid/empty and should be replaced with the real Cursor logo if one becomes available
SVG path data for Claude and GitHub Copilot logos is manually transcribed inline in AgentLogos.tsx — if logos are updated, the asset files and the component must both be updated
